00006 const std::string RmLocalMap::update( const RmUtility::SonarReading& reading )
00007 {
00008         RmUtility::Pose origin( m_globalOrigin.coord, m_settings->PreRotate ? m_globalOrigin.theta : 0.0 );
00009         return update( reading, origin, true );
00010 }
00011 
00012 
00013 const std::string RmLocalMap::update( 
00014         const RmUtility::SonarReading& reading, const RmUtility::Pose& pivot, bool saveHistory )
00015 {
00016         // Save sonar reading
00017         if ( saveHistory ) m_sonarReadings.push_back( reading );
00018 
00019         // Get the localized robot, sonar, and object pose data (only for first sonar of a sweep)
00020         static RmUtility::Pose lastPose_;
00021         static RmUtility::Pose localPose_;
00022         if ( lastPose_ != reading.robotPose ) 
00023         {
00024                 // If the pose of the first reading is (0,0):0 (such as when the robot starts up),
00025                 // this won't execute, but a rotation wouldn't have any effect anyway, so it's no prob
00026 
00027                 // Update cumulative distance traveled and degrees turned
00028                 // (accounting for transition across due north)
00029                 m_cumDist += reading.robotPose.coord.distanceFrom( lastPose_.coord );
00030                 double t = abs( reading.robotPose.theta - lastPose_.theta );
00031                 if ( t > 180 ) t = abs( t - 360 );
00032                 m_cumTurn += t;
00033 
00034                 localPose_ = lastPose_ = reading.robotPose;
00035                 if ( pivot.theta != 0 ) 
00036                 {
00037                         // If there were no concern for efficiency, everything in this block could be
00038                         // removed but these two commands, which is where the real work gets done:
00039                         localPose_.coord.rotateBy( pivot.theta, pivot.coord );
00040                         localPose_.theta += pivot.theta;
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 
00044         // Get map of sonar reading
00045         // Viewer is expecting blank line as token separating output between calls to update()
00046         std::string map = RmBayesCertaintyGrid::update( 
00047                 RmUtility::SonarReading( localPose_, &reading.all[0], reading.sonarNumber ) );
00048         if ( map.length() > 0 ) map.append( "\n" );
00049 
00050         return map;
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 const std::string RmLocalMap::reorientedBy( const RmUtility::Pose& shift ) const
00055 {
00056         // Start with a clean slate
00057         RmBayesCertaintyGrid grid( m_settings );
00058 
00059         // Shift all robot poses from global origin and recalculate sonar poses and probabilities
00060         std::string logString;
00061         for ( std::vector<RmUtility::SonarReading>::const_iterator reading = m_sonarReadings.begin(); 
00062                 reading != m_sonarReadings.end(); ++reading )
00063         {
00064                 RmUtility::SonarReading r = *reading;
00065                 r.robotPose += shift;
00066                 r.robotPose.coord.rotateBy( shift.theta, m_globalOrigin.coord + shift.coord );
00067 
00068                 std::string map = grid.update( r );
00069                 if ( map.length() > 0 ) {
00070                         logString.append( map + "\n" );
00071                 }
00072         }
00073 
00074         return logString;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 const std::string RmLocalMap::reorientBy( const RmUtility::Pose& shift )
00079 {
00080         // Wipe the slate clean
00081         empty();
00082 
00083         // Shift the global origin
00084         m_globalOrigin += shift;
00085 
00086         // Shift all the robot poses and recalculate sonar poses and probabilities
00087         std::string logString;
00088         for ( std::vector<RmUtility::SonarReading>::iterator reading = m_sonarReadings.begin(); 
00089                 reading != m_sonarReadings.end(); ++reading )
00090         {
00091                 (*reading).robotPose += shift;
00092                 (*reading).robotPose.coord.rotateBy( shift.theta, m_globalOrigin.coord );
00093 
00094                 std::string map = RmBayesCertaintyGrid::update( *reading );
00095                 if ( map.length() > 0 ) {
00096                         logString.append( map + "\n" );
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100         return logString;
00101 }
